name: Extreme Journey 2
description:
Welcome to Extreme Journey 2, a driving game where you drive around amazing locations to complete them as fast as possible. Levels differ by their design. and solutions.

Extreme Journey 2 is the sequel to the first Extreme Journey, adding different kinds of locations and bringing in more features like changeable camera position and fewer but more dynamic and faster levels.

Here are the controls

Arrow keys, well you don't need an explanation for this do you?

M to open the map. Not all levels include a map.

P to pause the game. Pause menu includes the level restart, main menu buttons and a volume slider.

F1 and F2- camera positions

R - restart the level
